draft:
SUBJECT: Emmanuel - congrats on announcement

Hi Emmanuel,

I saw the news about Chowdeck's announcement - "Lagos, Nigeria-Based Chowdeck, An On-Demand Delivery Platform ...". Congratulations!

I'm David Ariyo, a Full Stack Developer. I recently built Dassage Communication Platform - Real-time messaging with video calls, file sharing, WebSocket architecture

Tech: React, Node.js, MongoDB, WebSocket | Scale: 100+ concurrent users

Would you be open to a brief chat if Chowdeck ever needs freelance development support?

Best regards,
David Ariyo
Full Stack Developer
